We now need a results-driven, experienced Middle School Science Teacher to join our school community.

Success Academy has a science program like none other in the country. Beginning in kindergarten, scholars receive hands-on, inquiry-based science five days a week with a dedicated science teacher. Have 1+ years of lead teaching experience, with a proven record of propelling student intellectual growth;Hold a Bachelor’s degree with an outstanding record of academic achievement and leadership;Are a person of high moral character; andAre passionate about science and learning.

Consult with functional analytics teams tasked with building predictive frameworks for their discrete business units.

Degree in Computer Science/Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, Economics, Econometrics, or another quantitative field.

Comfort operating independently in a fast-paced work environment.
